translations: <正式>不可更改的，不可取消的，无法挽回的

sentences.sentence: He said the decision was irrevocable.
sentences.translation: 他说过这项决定是不可改变的。

sentences.sentence: The bank has made out an irrevocable letter of credit.
sentences.translation: 银行开出了不可撤销的信用证[状]。

sentences.sentence: We are prepared to accept payment by confirmed irrevocable L/C.
sentences.translation: 我方接受保兑的，不可撤销的信用证付款方式。
